message: I'm running the iOS5 beta and when you try to split the keyboard the app crashes.
@john_blanton thanks for reporting, haven't really tested on iOS 5
Not sure if its a convore issue or the app but it seems to time out frequently
@Quenton I think it is convore since I get that on the official iPhone app all the time could be API errors
@italiano40 it's partly a bug issue and the API as well... this is a major thing I know, I will do my best to resolve it in the next update.. hope convore does a better job as well
